name: Hungarian Cucumber Salad
author: Michelle Berger
summary: Great salad to make when you have a ton of cucumbers coming out of the garden. We make this year round but we are real cuke lovers in this family. Let it sit for a few days in the fridge and it's even better! Great make-ahead dish for BBQs and parties.
ingredients: 2 large seedless English cucumbers, sliced thin
½ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
directions: Lightly toss cucumber slices, onion slices, and chopped dill together in a large bowl
Pour vinegar over cucumber mixture; toss to coat
Pour oil over cucumber mixture; toss to coat
Season with salt and black pepper
